content.prompt: Which of the following was a direct consequence of selling enslaved children fathered by enslavers, as described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Enslavers established the system of selling enslaved persons at auction.
Large numbers of enslaved African Americans were displaced from the upper South to the lower South.
Enslaved women had great commercial value to their enslavers.
Enslaved women were treated better by their enslavers than were enslaved men.

topic.text: 2.8: The Social Construction of Race and the Reproduction of Status

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
